Valentine's Day Question Web App - A playful React application created to ask your special someone out on Valentine's Day despite having the flu.

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.
- [x] Clarify Project Requirements
- [x] Scaffold the Project  
- [x] Customize the Project
- [x] Install Required Extensions
- [x] Compile the Project
- [x] Create and Run Task
- [x] Launch the Project
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete

Project Features:
- Interactive asking experience with playful UI
- Flu-aware romantic messaging
- Animated hearts and Valentine's theme  
- Mobile responsive design
- Celebration mode with confetti
- Persistent charm offensive mode

Technical Stack:
- React 18 with Vite
- Modern CSS animations
- Responsive design

The development server runs on http://localhost:5173/ and is ready to help you ask your special someone out!
